column2: Analytical , enthusiastic and innovative manager with over 12 years in rural and infrastructural development
Proven ability to manage competing priorities and meeting time lines
Extensive experience in public relations, facilitation, negotiation and both oral and written communication
Proven ability to conceptualize and interpret events and issues
Demonstrated ability to organize and manage events with a track record of achievements
Proven ability in project conception, design and implementation
Proven ability to work under pressure independently and in a team
Demonstrated skills and knowledge in group dynamics, social networking and organizational development
Proven skills in project monitoring and evaluation while ensuring quality control
Proficiency in Information and communication Technology including software programs such as MS office, power point, excel
Ability in data compilation and report writing
Committed to empowering and enabling people and organizations overcome barriers and realize their full potentials and positive change
